PENALTY.SPREAD

Indicates the penalty spread part of the RATE field. This field will be populated if the relevant PD.PARAMETER record CONTRACT.METHOD field is set to '4', indicating that the penalty rate is made up of the contract rate plus penalty spread from the PD.PARAMETER record. To determine the underlying contract rate subtract the PENALTY.SPREAD value from the RATE value.
No input field. Standard T24 rate format.
